Property.name: product_id
Property.Description: Product Name

Property.name: project_id
Property.Description: Project Name

Property.name: baseline_id
Property.Description: Baseline Name

Property.name: command
Property.Description: Specifies a single Dimensions command to be executed.

Property.name: arguments
Property.Description: Specifies any required arguments for the DMCLI command.

Property.name: item_id
Property.Description: Item ID. May be omitted if 'File name' is defined.

Property.name: item_type
Property.Description: Item Type.

Property.name: workset
Property.Description: Comprises: (product-id):(project-id). Specifies the project to be processed by this command.

Property.name: file_name
Property.Description: Specifies the name of the file.

Property.name: revision
Property.Description: Item Revision.

Property.name: variant
Property.Description: Variant. May be omitted if only one exists.

Property.name: ws_filename
Property.Description: The WS_FILENAME qualifier specifies the workset filename for the item when adding the item to a project.

Property.name: directory_filter
Property.Description: Directory filter to restrict the number of items.

Property.name: user_directory
Property.Description: Specifies the directory to which items are to be fetched. If not set the user's default working area will be used.

Property.name: fetch_folder
Property.Description: Location in which items are fetched into.

Property.name: request_id
Property.Description: The name of a Dimensions request.

Property.name: status
Property.Description: Specifies the status to which the request is to be actioned. If this is not specified, the next default state is used.

Property.name: check
Property.Description: Valid Values are: ACTION - Check whether the request can be actioned to the state specified by the Status qualifier or the next normal state if 'Status' is not specified, while conforming to the current rules; CLOSURE - Check whether the specified request can be actioned to the final state in its normal lifecycle, while conforming to the current rules. This qualifier must not be used with the 'Status'; NO CHECK - No check is performed.

Property.name: request_type
Property.Description: Specifies the type of request to be created.

Property.name: catalogue_type
Property.Description: Determines the basis for the report. Valid values are:/CATALOGUE - Primary catalog of requests; /CATALOGUE/SECONDARY - Secondary catalog of requests; /PENDING - requests pending to user.

Property.name: request_category
Property.Description: This is the request category for all requests to appear in the report. Valid values are: 1 is for bugs or problems; 2 is for change or enhancement requests; 3 is for "other"; 4 is reserved for work packages; % is for requests from all categories.

Property.name: report_file
Property.Description: File where report will be saved.

Property.name: report_type
Property.Description: Determines which particular report type is returned

Property.name: attributes
Property.Description: Attributes of request - User must input at least Request title here. For example: attri1=value1,attr2=value2

Property.name: description_file
Property.Description: Specifies a file containing the text body to be used as the detailed description of the request. This file must contain text data only.

Property.name: change_doc_ids
Property.Description: Comma separated list of request names the add item task will be associated with.

Property.name: baseline
Property.Description: Optionally specifies the Dimensions baseline on which to base the new stream.

Property.name: base_stream
Property.Description: Optionally specifies the stream on which to base the new stream.

Property.name: stream_id
Property.Description: The name of stream.

Property.name: description
Property.Description: Specifies a description for the stream.

Property.name: destination_directory
Property.Description: Is the destination directory to move the project/stream structure to.

Property.name: source_directory
Property.Description: Is the source directory to move the project/stream structure from.

Property.name: delivery_spec
Property.Description: Specifies either the name of a file to be delivered, a directory path from where files will be delivered (recursively) or a file spec specifying a file containing a list of filenames to be delivered.

Property.name: extract_folder
Property.Description: Folder in which files will be extraced to.

Property.name: /dimensions/username
Property.Description: Username to access Serena Dimensions CM.

Property.name: /dimensions/password
Property.Description: Password to access Serena Dimensions CM.

Property.name: /dimensions/hostname
Property.Description: Serena Dimensions CM hostname.

Property.name: /dimensions/dbname
Property.Description: Specifies the Serena Dimensions CM database identifier.

Property.name: /dimensions/dsn
Property.Description: Specifies the data source name for connecting to the database.

Property.name: /dimensions/action_request/check
Property.Description: Valid Values are: ACTION - Check whether the request can be actioned to the state specified by the Status qualifier or the next normal state if 'Status' is not specified, while conforming to the current rules; CLOSURE - Check whether the specified request can be actioned to the final state in its normal lifecycle, while conforming to the current rules. This qualifier must not be used with the 'Status'; NO CHECK - No check is performed.

Property.name: /dimensions/action_request/request_id
Property.Description: The name of a Dimensions request.

Property.name: /dimensions/action_request/status
Property.Description: Specifies the status to which the request is to be actioned. If this is not specified, the next default state is used.

Property.name: /dimensions/action_request_items/request_id
Property.Description: The name of a Dimensions request.

Property.name: /dimensions/action_request_items/status
Property.Description: Specifies the status to which items and requests are to be actioned. If this is not specified, the next default state is used.

Property.name: /dimensions/action_request_items/workset
Property.Description: Comprises: (product-id):(project-id)Specifies the project to be processed by this command.

Property.name: /dimensions/add_item_revision_to_project/change_doc_ids
Property.Description: Comma separated list of request names the add item task will be associated with.

Property.name: /dimensions/add_item_revision_to_project/file_name
Property.Description: Specifies the name of the project file name.

Property.name: /dimensions/add_item_revision_to_project/item_id
Property.Description: Item ID. May be omitted if 'File name' is defined.

Property.name: /dimensions/add_item_revision_to_project/item_type
Property.Description: Item Type.

Property.name: /dimensions/add_item_revision_to_project/product_id
Property.Description: Product Name

Property.name: /dimensions/add_item_revision_to_project/revision
Property.Description: Item Revision.

Property.name: /dimensions/add_item_revision_to_project/variant
Property.Description: Variant. May be omitted if only one exists.

Property.name: /dimensions/add_item_revision_to_project/workset
Property.Description: Workset

Property.name: /dimensions/add_item_revision_to_project/ws_filename
Property.Description: he WS_FILENAME qualifier specifies the workset filename for the item when adding the item to a project.

Property.name: /dimensions/add_request_items_to_project/directory_filter
Property.Description: Directory filter to restrict the number of items to be added.

Property.name: /dimensions/add_request_items_to_project/request_id
Property.Description: The name of a Dimensions request.

Property.name: /dimensions/add_request_items_to_project/workset
Property.Description: Workset name. If not specified, users current project will be used

Property.name: /dimensions/browse_request/file_name
Property.Description: Specifies the name of the file which will be created in the user area, and into which the request will be gotten.

Property.name: /dimensions/browse_request/request_id
Property.Description: The name of a Dimensions request.

Property.name: /dimensions/create_request/product_id
Property.Description: Specifies the product that is to own the new request.

Property.name: /dimensions/create_request/request_type
Property.Description: Specifies the type of request to be created.

Property.name: /dimensions/create_request/attributes
Property.Description: Attributes of request - User must input at least Request title here. For example: attri1=value1,attr2=value2

Property.name: /dimensions/create_request/description_file
Property.Description: Specifies a file containing the text body to be used as the detailed description of the request. This file must contain text data only.

Property.name: /dimensions/create_stream/baseline
Property.Description: Optionally specifies the Dimensions baseline on which to base the new stream

Property.name: /dimensions/create_stream/base_stream
Property.Description: Optionally specifies the stream on which to base the new stream.

Property.name: /dimensions/create_stream/description
Property.Description: Specifies a description for the stream.

Property.name: /dimensions/create_stream/stream_id
Property.Description: The name of stream.

Property.name: /dimensions/delete_stream/stream_id
Property.Description: The identity of a Dimensions stream to delete.

Property.name: /dimensions/deliver/change_doc_ids
Property.Description: The requests for the items to be related to. The originally fetched versions will be related as "Affected", and the newly created versions will be "In Response To".

Property.name: /dimensions/deliver/delivery_spec
Property.Description: Specifies either the name of a file to be delivered, a directory path from where files will be delivered (recursively) or a file spec specifying a file containing a list of filenames to be delivered.

Property.name: /dimensions/extract_item/file_name
Property.Description: Specifies the name of the project file name. If /ROOT_PROJECT is used to specify a the root project, /FILENAME is interpreted in the scope of that project.

Property.name: /dimensions/extract_item/item_id
Property.Description: Item ID. May be omitted if 'File name' is defined.

Property.name: /dimensions/extract_item/item_type
Property.Description: Item Type.

Property.name: /dimensions/extract_item/product_id
Property.Description: Specifies the product for update.

Property.name: /dimensions/extract_item/revision
Property.Description: Item Revision.

Property.name: /dimensions/extract_item/variant
Property.Description: Variant. May be omitted if only one exists.

Property.name: /dimensions/extract_item/workset
Property.Description: Workset name. If not specified, users current project will be used.

Property.name: /dimensions/extract_request_items/extract_folder
Property.Description: Folder in which files will be extraced to.

Property.name: /dimensions/extract_request_items/request_id
Property.Description: The name of a Dimensions request.

Property.name: /dimensions/fetch_baseline_items/baseline_id
Property.Description: Baseline ID

Property.name: /dimensions/fetch_baseline_items/directory_filter
Property.Description: Specifies the directory to which items are to be fetched.

Property.name: /dimensions/fetch_baseline_items/product_id
Property.Description: Product ID

Property.name: /dimensions/fetch_baseline_items/user_directory
Property.Description: Specifies the directory to which items are to be fetched. If not set the user's default working area will be used.

Property.name: /dimensions/fetch_item/file_name
Property.Description: Specifies the name of the project file name. If /ROOT_PROJECT is used to specify a the root project, /FILENAME is interpreted in the scope of that project.

Property.name: /dimensions/fetch_item/item_id
Property.Description: Item ID. May be omitted if 'File name' is defined.

Property.name: /dimensions/fetch_item/item_type
Property.Description: Item Type.

Property.name: /dimensions/fetch_item/product_id
Property.Description: Specifies the product name.

Property.name: /dimensions/fetch_item/revision
Property.Description: Item Revision.

Property.name: /dimensions/fetch_item/variant
Property.Description: Variant. May be omitted if only one exists.

Property.name: /dimensions/fetch_item/workset
Property.Description: Workset name. If not specified, users current project will be used.

Property.name: /dimensions/fetch_project_items/directory_filter
Property.Description: Specifies the directory to which items are to be fetched.

Property.name: /dimensions/fetch_project_items/product_id
Property.Description: Product ID

Property.name: /dimensions/fetch_project_items/project_id
Property.Description: Project ID

Property.name: /dimensions/fetch_project_items/user_directory
Property.Description: Specifies the directory to which items are to be fetched. If not set the user's default working area will be used.

Property.name: /dimensions/fetch_request_items/fetch_folder
Property.Description: Location in which items are fetched into.

Property.name: /dimensions/fetch_request_items/request_id
Property.Description: The name of a Dimensions request.

Property.name: /dimensions/generic/arguments
Property.Description: Specifies any required arguments for the DMCLI command.

Property.name: /dimensions/generic/command
Property.Description: Specifies a single Dimensions command to be executed.

Property.name: /dimensions/move_directory/change_doc_ids
Property.Description: Comma separated list of change ids directory move will be recorded against.

Property.name: /dimensions/move_directory/destination_directory
Property.Description: Is the destination directory to move the project/stream structure to.

Property.name: /dimensions/move_directory/source_directory
Property.Description: Is the source directory to move the project/stream structure from.

Property.name: /dimensions/move_directory/workset
Property.Description: This optionally specifies the project/stream to be used for this command: failing this, the user's current project/stream will be taken.

Property.name: /dimensions/remove_item_revision_from_project/change_doc_ids
Property.Description: Comma separated list of request names the add item task will be associated with.

Property.name: /dimensions/remove_item_revision_from_project/file_name
Property.Description: Specifies the name of the project file name.

Property.name: /dimensions/remove_item_revision_from_project/item_id
Property.Description: Item ID. May be omitted if 'File name' is defined.

Property.name: /dimensions/remove_item_revision_from_project/item_type
Property.Description: Item Type.

Property.name: /dimensions/remove_item_revision_from_project/product_id
Property.Description: Product Name

Property.name: /dimensions/remove_item_revision_from_project/revision
Property.Description: Item Revision.

Property.name: /dimensions/remove_item_revision_from_project/variant
Property.Description: Variant. May be omitted if only one exists.

Property.name: /dimensions/remove_item_revision_from_project/workset
Property.Description: Workset

Property.name: /dimensions/report_requests/catalogue_type
Property.Description: Determines the basis for the report. Valid values are:/CATALOGUE - Primary catalog of requests; /CATALOGUE/SECONDARY - Secondary catalog of requests; /PENDING - requests pending to user.

Property.name: /dimensions/report_requests/product_id
Property.Description: Product ID report will be generated against.

Property.name: /dimensions/report_requests/report_file
Property.Description: File where report will be saved.

Property.name: /dimensions/report_requests/report_type
Property.Description: Determines which particular report type is returned

Property.name: /dimensions/report_requests/request_category
Property.Description: This is the request category for all requests to appear in the report. Valid values are: 1 is for bugs or problems; 2 is for change or enhancement requests; 3 is for "other"; 4 is reserved for work packages; % is for requests from all categories.

Property.name: /dimensions/return_item/file_name
Property.Description: Specifies the name of the project file name. If /ROOT_PROJECT is used to specify a the root project, /FILENAME is interpreted in the scope of that project.

Property.name: /dimensions/return_item/item_id
Property.Description: Item ID. May be omitted if 'File name' is defined.

Property.name: /dimensions/return_item/item_type
Property.Description: Item Type.

Property.name: /dimensions/return_item/product_id
Property.Description: Product Name

Property.name: /dimensions/return_item/revision
Property.Description: Item Revision.

Property.name: /dimensions/return_item/variant
Property.Description: Variant. May be omitted if only one exists.

Property.name: /dimensions/return_item/workset
Property.Description: Workset name. If not specified, users current project will be used.

Property.name: /dimensions/update_attributes/product_id
Property.Description: Product Name

Property.name: /dimensions/update_attributes/project_id
Property.Description: Project Name

Property.name: /snapshot/archive_path
Property.Description: The path where all snapshots will be stored.

Property.name: /snapshot/source_path
Property.Description: The path to the directory, that the snapshot will be taken of.

Property.name: /snapshot/snapshot_filter_include
Property.Description: Filter the snapshot by filename. Multiple filters can be given using , as seperator. Eg: dir1/*,*.txt

Property.name: /snapshot/snapshot_filter_exclude
Property.Description: Filter the snapshot by filename. Multiple filters can be given using , as seperator. Eg: dir1/*,*.txt

Property.name: /source/protocol
Property.Description: Defines the protocol to use to get the component from source.

Property.name: /source/source_files_dirs
Property.Description: Remote file/directory to be downloaded. Directory not supported for HTTP(S). Not required for TFS, CVS, SVN

Property.name: /target/target_files_dirs
Property.Description: Name of a local file/directory where downloaded file/directory is stored. HTTP(S):Directory not supported. CVS, TFS: must be a directory.

Property.name: /target/overwrite_target
Property.Description: Overwrite local files/directory if exist. For SVN, all files will be exported but already present files will not be overwritten. For TFS, overwrites all items in the workspace(CLI: /force)

Property.name: /source/http/url
Property.Description: URL

Property.name: /source/http/port
Property.Description: Port of HTTP connection

Property.name: /source/http/username
Property.Description: Username to authenticate with the server (if required by the server)

Property.name: /source/http/password
Property.Description: Password to authenticate with the server (if required by the server)

Property.name: /source/http/connection_timeout
Property.Description: Timeout in miliseconds to wait to build up a connection to the target host. Default: 5000.

Property.name: /source/http/proxy_host
Property.Description: Proxy host to use.

Property.name: /source/http/proxy_port
Property.Description: Proxy port to use.

Property.name: /source/http/proxy_user
Property.Description: Username if proxy requires authentication.

Property.name: /source/http/proxy_pwd
Property.Description: Password if proxy requires authentication.

Property.name: /source/https/url
Property.Description: URL

Property.name: /source/https/port
Property.Description: Port of HTTPS connection

Property.name: /source/https/username
Property.Description: Username to authenticate with the server (if required by the server)

Property.name: /source/https/password
Property.Description: Password to authenticate with the server (if required by the server)

Property.name: /source/https/connection_timeout
Property.Description: Timeout in miliseconds to wait to build up a connection to the target host. Default: 5000.

Property.name: /source/https/proxy_host
Property.Description: Proxy host to use.

Property.name: /source/https/proxy_port
Property.Description: Proxy port to use.

Property.name: /source/https/proxy_user
Property.Description: Username if proxy requires authentication.

Property.name: /source/https/proxy_pwd
Property.Description: Password if proxy requires authentication.

Property.name: /source/ftp/host
Property.Description: Host to connect to.

Property.name: /source/ftp/port
Property.Description: Port to connect to.

Property.name: /source/ftp/username
Property.Description: Username to authenticate with the server (if required by the server)

Property.name: /source/ftp/password
Property.Description: Password to authenticate with the server (if required by the server)

Property.name: /source/ftp/recursive_download
Property.Description: Recursively get files and directories. If set to no, only direct children of the directory are downloaded

Property.name: /source/ftp/connection_timeout
Property.Description: Timeout in miliseconds to wait to build up a connection to the target host. Default: 5000.

Property.name: /source/ftp/proxy_host
Property.Description: Proxy host to use.

Property.name: /source/ftp/proxy_port
Property.Description: Proxy port to use.

Property.name: /source/ftp/proxy_user
Property.Description: Username if proxy requires authentication.

Property.name: /source/ftp/proxy_pwd
Property.Description: Password if proxy requires authentication.

Property.name: /source/ftp/transfer_mode
Property.Description: Text/Binary transfer modes.

Property.name: /source/ftps/host
Property.Description: Host to connect to.

Property.name: /source/ftps/port
Property.Description: Port to connect to.

Property.name: /source/ftps/username
Property.Description: Username to authenticate with the server (if required by the server)

Property.name: /source/ftps/password
Property.Description: Password to authenticate with the server (if required by the server)

Property.name: /source/ftps/recursive_download
Property.Description: Recursively get files and directories. If set to no, only direct children of the directory are downloaded

Property.name: /source/ftps/connection_timeout
Property.Description: Timeout in miliseconds to wait to build up a connection to the target host. Default: 5000.

Property.name: /source/ftps/proxy_host
Property.Description: Proxy host to use.

Property.name: /source/ftps/proxy_port
Property.Description: Proxy port to use.

Property.name: /source/ftps/proxy_user
Property.Description: Username if proxy requires authentication.

Property.name: /source/ftps/proxy_pwd
Property.Description: Password if proxy requires authentication.

Property.name: /source/ftps/transfer_mode
Property.Description: Text/Binary transfer modes.

Property.name: /source/sftp/host
Property.Description: Host to connect to.

Property.name: /source/sftp/port
Property.Description: Port to connect to.

Property.name: /source/sftp/username
Property.Description: Username to authenticate with the server (if required by the server)

Property.name: /source/sftp/password
Property.Description: Password to authenticate with the server (if required by the server)

Property.name: /source/sftp/recursive_download
Property.Description: Recursively get files and directories. If set to no, only direct children of the directory are downloaded

Property.name: /source/sftp/connection_timeout
Property.Description: Timeout in miliseconds to wait to build up a connection to the target host. Default: 5000.

Property.name: /source/sftp/preserve_att
Property.Description: Preserves creation/modification times and modes of the original files. Default: yes

Property.name: /source/scp/host
Property.Description: Host to connect to.

Property.name: /source/scp/port
Property.Description: Port to connect to.

Property.name: /source/scp/username
Property.Description: Username to authenticate with the server (if required by the server)

Property.name: /source/scp/password
Property.Description: Password to authenticate with the server (if required by the server)

Property.name: /source/scp/preserve_att
Property.Description: Preserves creation/modification times and modes of the original files. Default: yes

Property.name: /source/scp/recursive_download
Property.Description: Recursively get files and directories. If set to no, only direct children of the directory are downloaded

Property.name: /source/scp/connection_timeout
Property.Description: Timeout in miliseconds to wait to build up a connection to the target host. Default: 5000.

Property.name: /source/smb/host
Property.Description: Host to connect to.

Property.name: /source/smb/port
Property.Description: Port to connect to.

Property.name: /source/smb/username
Property.Description: Username to authenticate with the server (if required by the server)

Property.name: /source/smb/password
Property.Description: Password to authenticate with the server (if required by the server)

Property.name: /source/smb/preserve_att
Property.Description: Preserves creation/modification times and modes of the original files. Default: yes

Property.name: /source/smb/recursive_download
Property.Description: Recursively get files and directories. If set to no, only direct children of the directory are downloaded

Property.name: /source/smb/connection_timeout
Property.Description: Timeout in miliseconds to wait to build up a connection to the target host. Default: 5000.

Property.name: /source/smb/domain_name
Property.Description: Required if target machine belongs to a windows domain.

Property.name: /source/uc4_ft/host
Property.Description: The source host (agent name).

Property.name: /source/uc4_ft/transfer_format
Property.Description: Transfer format setting. Default: text

Property.name: /source/uc4_ft/use_compression
Property.Description: Use the compression for the transfer (needs CPU!). Default: no

Property.name: /source/uc4_ft/transfer_subdirs
Property.Description: Option to transfer the content of the sub directories as well(works only if source file is a directory). Default: yes

Property.name: /source/uc4_ft/parallel_transfer
Property.Description: Number of parallel transfers (works only if source file is a directory). Default: 5

Property.name: /source/svn/uri
Property.Description: Repository URI. Example: svn://repo/app/trunk or https://repo:1942/app/trunk.

Property.name: /source/svn/username
Property.Description: Username used for authentication with the repository.

Property.name: /source/svn/password
Property.Description: Password used for authentication with the repository.

Property.name: /source/svn/revision
Property.Description: Revision number. In case no revision is specified, revision will be HEAD. CLI option -r.

Property.name: /source/svn/trust_server_cert
Property.Description: Defines whether to accept unknown SSL server certificates or not. CLI option --trust-server-cert. Default: Yes

Property.name: /source/cvs/uri
Property.Description: Repository URI. Example: ":pserver:username@cvs.server.local:/usr/local/cvs/application".

Property.name: /source/cvs/module
Property.Description: Module that should be exported.

Property.name: /source/cvs/password
Property.Description: Password used for authentication with the repository.

Property.name: /source/cvs/revision
Property.Description: Revision number. In case no revision is specified, revision will be HEAD. CLI option -r.

Property.name: /source/tfs/util_path
Property.Description: Path to the tf.exe utility which will be used to communicate with Team Foundation Server. If no path was specified, the default value (C:/Program Files/Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0/Common7/IDE/Tf) will be assumed.

Property.name: /source/tfs/item
Property.Description: File or folder to retrieve. If no itemspec is provided, Team Foundation Server performs a recursive get operation of the current workspace. For ex: $/Project/

Property.name: /source/tfs/version
Property.Description: Optional version specification. The versionspec is the version of the item you want to retrieve. You can specify a version by: Date/time (D10/20/2005), Changeset version (C1256), Label (Lmylabel), Latest version (T), Workspace version (Workspacename;owner). If no version is provided, Team Foundation Server retrieves the latest server version of the specified itemspec into your workspace.

Property.name: /source/tfs/retrieve_all
Property.Description: Replace the file on disk, even if the workspace version is the same as the requested server version. Used when "Overwrite files" option is set to NO.(CLI option /all)

Property.name: /source/tfs/overwrite
Property.Description: Forcibly overwrite the writable current workspace version with a specified server version. Used only when "Overwrite files" option is set to NO.(CLI option /overwrite)

Property.name: /source/tfs/recursive
Property.Description: Recursively retrieves all items that match your itemspec.

Property.name: /staging/working_files_dirs
Property.Description: Files/Directory on the staging server after downloaded from source.

Property.name: /staging/agent
Property.Description: Agent which will be used for staging

Property.name: /staging/working_base_dir
Property.Description: Base directory on the staging server where package should be downloaded to.
